channel.title: Need help getting my server online
channel.description:
ok this is what i do 1 . i get up my no-ip [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/5425/07nov02153638an8.jpg[/img] 2. then i load up my server(making it playable) [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/640/07nov02153834vy5.jpg[/img] 3. and then i try to log in. [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/4944/07nov02154023ll3.jpg[/img]
i think it mite be my portforwarding,this is what i type in, [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/4157/07nov02154159sp4.jpg[/img]
after i click save setting it does this [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/1774/07nov02154421px1.jpg[/img]
should i do something with my ip on port forwording? [IMG]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/3989/07nov02154529aa6.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help getting my server online

item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

Hey I have the same problem and on the part where you fill in the ip do you put the last number of the default gateway or the computer ip adress?

Read full topic

item.description:
@jereme2007 wrote:

I got vista… you click the start button… show all documents or programs, accesories and command prompt… then go on from what he says… And if your using Qwest… portforwarding is very hard… never got it to work for me

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @pure_barrage pure barrage
item.description:
@pure_barrage wrote:

oh so just put that last number i left in the box blank and it should work?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2007, 02:21:38 PM[/size][hr]omfg thank you so much it worked!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

You cant run CMD? Yeah vista is a bit too safe. Try command.com in your run window. If not, you’re going to have to find a way to open it. I don’t have vista, thank god. You know that place that you have portfowarded with, the one that you have in the screenshots. That’s your router.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @pure_barrage pure barrage
item.description:
@pure_barrage wrote:

ok i cant find run im on vista[br][size=1]Posted on: November 02, 2007, 02:15:35 PM[/size][hr]ok how to i get to router settings?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

Go to Start>Run>cmd

type in ipconfig and you’ll see default gateway and stuff. Next to the one that says IP address, you should see 192.168.15.x, whatever that last number is, fill it into the last box under IP address on your router settings.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my server online

item.title: Need help getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

You havn’t filled in the last part of your IP address. You need to foward it to your PC.

Read full topic

www.portforward.com
